ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank Dr. Nashwa Sideeg and Dr. Reem Hassan Ahmed (Department of Biotechnology) and Uz. Telal Mohammed Najeeb for their help in statistic analysis of cytotoxcicity, a technician UZ. Mogahid Ibrahim Mustufa, Department of Biochemistry, for the technical support during their work in the laboratory, and University of Bahri for funding and allowing to use the labs. This study was financed by the Deanship of Academic Research, University of Bahri, Sudan, with Code No: U of B-1-201.
